meanings.definition: Not suffering from a severe mental disorder that causes a loss of contact with reality.
meanings.sent1: She is a nonpsychotic individual who sees the world clearly.
meanings.sent2: The therapist confirmed that the patient was nonpsychotic.
meanings.sent3: Even in stressful situations, she remains nonpsychotic and calm.
meanings.sent4: His rational thinking made him stand out as nonpsychotic among his peers.
meanings.sent5: The nonpsychotic approach to problem-solving helped him succeed.

meanings.sent1: The nonpsychotic behavior of the student impressed the teacher.
meanings.sent2: The doctor assured the family that the patient was nonpsychotic.
meanings.sent3: Despite the chaos, his nonpsychotic demeanor remained unchanged.
meanings.sent4: Her clear mind and nonpsychotic actions inspired others.
meanings.sent5: The nonpsychotic attitude of the team leader kept everyone focused.
